name: A-List Girl: Spa Beauty Salon 2
description:
The A-List Girl Saga is back! With more than 10 million downloads! The best girl and kids games!

*****

Manage the biggest beauty salon in Hollywood!

Serve celebrity clients with the best service! Collect stars to win popularity!

Expand your business by adding new treatments and hire employees! Have the biggest spa salon in town!

Play against other people in the world! Crush the leader boards with high scores. Have the best beauty salon in the world!

Play with beauty treatments like:

*Hairdresser - do hair styles, cut, wash and color hair.
*Makeup - do cute make up looks, dash glitter over cute eye shadow, eyelashes, put mascara and lipstick!
*Nail Salon - play with nail design, decorate gel nails, cut nails, do nail makeovers.
*Pedicure and Manicure - make the feet look pretty.
*Tan - try the tanning beds and do tan makeovers!
*Wax - remove hair, wax legs, shave leg hair of man and woman.
*Massage chair - relax in this spa, do massages, amazing mini games to train your memory!
*Beard - shave your boyfriend beard in this beard salon! Try different beard looks and designs.
*Relax in the pool or sauna, make delicious smoothies and much more!

Join the fun with this free game for girls and children! The best learning games for kids on iTunes! Train your memory, synchronizing skills, learn to manage time, money and how to run a business!
